'''Decorum''' is [[Kujou Sara]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The wording of this Talent is misleading. It actually means Sara restores 0.012 Flat Energy to all party members for each 1% of Energy Recharge she has, including the base 100%.
